posts.name: Crawfish and Noodles
posts.note: Crawfish and Noodles serve spicy crawfish which tops the menu of Vietnamese and Cajun fare at this contemporary venue with happy hours.

posts.name: Glazed the Doughnut Cafe
posts.note: Glazed the Doughnut Cafe has gourmet donuts that are whipped up round the clock at this specialty cafe near the Medical Center in the Loop. Where the namesake treat comes in creative cake flavors like sangria, bananas Foster, and eggplant and Parmesan, plus innovative glazes like Dr. Pepper. NOTE: They have multiple locations.
